name: Simplenote remove border
description: This style removes the gray border and some of the frills at the edges from Simplenote. It is ideal if you'd like to use Google Chrome's "application shortcut" feature, and use the web interface like a desktop application. Or if you'd just like to see more of the note at a time.
additional_info:
Dec 7, 2010 - Initial release.

Aug 30, 2011 - Fixed the menus so that they aren't cut off.

Oct 6, 2011 - Style now overrides default css properly in Firefox.
